tool_description: FREE ACCESS - TRY IT NOW!! Astro is an Uruguayan AI research. It generates text and images.
name: Astro AI
title: Astro AI

api_list.name: Chat
api_list.description: Chat with Astro. Use the official model or you can create one to use here.

api_list.name: Generate Image
api_list.description: Generate Images. This endpoint uses the Astro Dreamer-01 model to generate the results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://astro-ai.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "astro-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://astro-ai.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "astro-ai.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
